import { React, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import {useParams} from "react-router-dom" let Play = ({currentUser,setCurrentUser,selectedChampion,setSelectedChampion}) => { const [itemData, setItemData] = useState([]) const [selectedItem, setSelectedItem] = useState([]) const [championData, setChampionData] = useState([]) const params = useParams() console.log("on play") return (
Map: {selectedMap}
Champion: {selectedChampion.name} {selectedChampion.title}
Game Mode: {selectedGameMode}

{selectedChampion.name} {selectedChampion.title}

{selectedChampion.blurb}
Select your Champion {Object.values(champsToDisplay).map(champion => { return (
handleSelectChampion(champion)}>

{champion.name}

) })}
Current User: {currentUser.username}
) } export default Play
